title: Awesome game! Just one tiny thing..
text: Subway surfers is a very fun game that I used to play a lot when I was younger, and I downloaded it again recently. The only thing is that when we download the app back, it should save our progress and the amount of characters we have. I had almost all the characters I liked, and once I downloaded it again, my progress was gone. But otherwise, it’s a very fun game!

title: One of the best game I have ever played but one flaw.
text:
This game is extremely good and I love the events and updates! The game is very fun and I am not very surprised it’s so popular. The amount of features in the game leaves me speechless and mind blown! However there is one flaw but I am still going bc to rate it 5 stars just in case. Sometimes when I use an add to continue the game it will just give me an infinite white screen or there will just be a blue bar that just sits there so I will have to edit the game and lose all of my progress in that run.

Conclusion
Overall a great game with new surprises every day! I really recommend this game if you don’t already play it because this game is the best game I have ever played! 😊

title: YESS
text: I’ve been playing subway surfers from a very young age and have never gotten bored of it. It’s very entertaining and I love how it gets faster as you move on. Now I wish the prices of the characters/skins or boards to ride on would go down a bit. I also love how you can collect mystery boxes and keys! This is a really fun game and I recommend getting it. Collecting coins is really fun and satisfying for some reason to me and I’m just IN LOVE with the backgrounds and all that stuff. I also like how they change the themes sometimes for different events. Once again it’s really fun and kills your boredom in seconds!

title: Good but a few ideas
text:
I liked the game and I would recommend it as one of my top wireless games but I have a few ideas.First of all I think the avatars are personally not great i feel like there should be more options that were cute clothes and good hair there were some that were fine but I had to pay for them. Second of all,the game is very addictive so maybe there should be a limit you can put in for a personalized time.there should also be some wing that you could earn so you could fly over obstacles.
Thank you for reading it.🚇🏄‍♂️
